Package org.jgentleframework.context.aop

Interface Summary
ClassFilter Filter that restricts matching of a pointcut or introduction to a given set of target classes.
ConstructorFilter Filter that restricts matching of a pointcut or introduction to a given set of target Constructor.
FieldFilter The Interface FieldFilter.
Filter<T extends Matching> The Interface Filter.
MethodFilter Filter that restricts matching of a pointcut or introduction to a given set of methods.
ParameterFilter<T> Filter that restricts matching of a pointcut or introduction to a given set of parameters corresponding to an given set of methods.
Pointcut<T extends Matching> Core JGentle pointcut abstraction.
PointcutOfAll Represents all pointcut.
PointcutOfClassFilter<T extends Matching> Represents the ClassFilter pointcut.
PointcutOfConstructorFilter<T extends Matching> Represents the ConstructorFilter pointcut.
PointcutOfFieldFilter<T extends Matching> Represents the FieldFilter pointcut.
PointcutOfMethodFilter<T extends Matching> Represents the MethodFilter pointcut.
PointcutOfParameterFilter<T extends Matching> Represents the ParameterFilter pointcut.
RuntimeSupportFilter<T extends Matching> Represents a runtime support filter.
 

Class Summary
DynamicallySupportFilter<T extends Matching> Represents a dinamically filter.
StaticallySupportFilter<T extends Matching> Represents a statically filter.
TrueFieldFilter Canonical FieldFilter instance that matches all Field.
TrueMethodFilter Canonical MethodFilter instance that matches all Method.
TrueParameterFilter Canonical ParameterFilter instance that matches all parameters of all methods.
